name: Pact (itch)
description:
Engage in a fight to the death with up to 4 friends in this fast-paced cultist fighting game. Fight in two beautiful and grim locations! Steal the Souls from helpless civilians and use them to perform magical abilities! Collect enough Souls and you can transform into your powerful Demon Form with enhanced stats and abilities!

Controls - REQUIRES GAMEPAD TO PLAY

A - Select / Jump (you can jump up to three times)

X - Attack

Y - Special Attack (requires 1 Soul)

B (Hold) - Heal (requires 1 Soul)

Left Stick - Change Selection / Move Character

Left Trigger - Demon Form (requires 3 Souls)

Right Trigger - Dash

Credits

Game Design, Programming, Composing, Particle FX - David Winstein-Hibbs

Terrain Art, Backgrounds, and Menus - Katie Burke

Character Art and Animation - Hannah Wertz
